thread.title: BRIEF-Takeda Responds to Media Reports About CEO's Comments On Possible Offer For Shire

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Takeda Responds to Media Reports About CEO's Comments On Possible Offer For Shire
text:
April 6 (Reuters) - Takeda Pharmaceutical Co Ltd:
* STATEMENT REGARDING PRESS REPORTS * ‍NOTES MEDIA REPORTS ABOUT COMMENTS ATTRIBUTED TO TAKEDA’S CEO CHRISTOPHE WEBER REGARDING COMPANY’S POSSIBLE OFFER FOR SHIRE PLC​
* ‍”CONFIRMS THAT WEBER’S COMMENTS WERE, HOWEVER, ALIGNED WITH STATEMENTS IN OUR PREVIOUS PRESS RELEASES”​
* ‍ PRIOR STATEMENTS “CLEARLY DEFINED STRATEGIC AND FINANCIAL OBJECTIVES CORE TO ITS DISCIPLINED APPROACH TO ACQUISITIONS”
* ‍”ANY POTENTIAL OFFER FOR SHIRE, IF MADE, WOULD HAVE TO ALIGN WITH THE STRICT INVESTMENT CRITERIA”​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
